committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the birth of David Ben-Gurion.

summary.text: Commemorates the centennial of David Ben-Gurion's birth. Applauds the David Ben-Gurion Centennial Committee of the United States of America for its work promoting the yearlong centennial celebration.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the birth of David Ben-Gurion.
